text: Smarana karaa, yidina te'om tomalokaka samabesa dirasara uddesye samabeta karaiba, se'idinatorae haâ€™ba ksatira dina; arau yijane allahara prati imana raakhe arau satkama karae, te'om tara papasamuha mocana karai diba arau taka jannatata praraesa karaaba, yara talata nadisamuha prabahita, tata sihamta cirasthayi haâ€™ba. E'itorae mahasaphalata
